content:
Hi all, I'm pleased to welcome @Chris Foster to the Admin team in this Zulip. That makes the current list of active administrators Chris, @Dilum Aluthge, @Sascha Mann and myself.

If you ever need to talk about rules or need help with zulip stuff, feel free to contact us. You can also send a private or public message to @zulip-admins to ping all of us at once.
Not a new admin, but @Valentin Churavy will be joining us as one of the active admins!
Hi all! I think I did set this up in '18 ;) It's been a while.

Hey everyone, @James Fairbanks is going to be joining our admin team! Just a reminder, you can reach the admin team by pinging @zulip-admins in public steams or by sending a private message to that user group.
Hi everyone, I’d like to welcome @Yingbo Ma to our admin team! Just a reminder that you can get in contact with any of us through direct messages, or all at once with @zulip-admins.
Welcome @Yingbo Ma! Reminder on that reminder, you can see the list of admins by clicking the @*zulip-admins* link

I’m pleased to announce that @Stefan Karpinski and @Viral B. Shah have joined the admin team! Big welcome to both of you.

Remember you can contact the admin team by pinging @zulip-admins!
